Selected work

Boardmatch

Salesforce · Experience Cloud

B2B education platform for professional courses, from discovery to high-fidelity design.

Avolta

SharePoint · Enterprise

Design of internal tools for corporate teams, focused on usability, scalability and adoption.

Bladderboss

Mobile app · Healthcare

UX design for a patient-focused mobile app, including research, user flows and wireframes.

Good design is not about adding features. It’s about removing friction.

How I work

01 Ask the right questions

I start by understanding people, constraints and business goals. No assumptions, just real context.

02Design with intent

I focus on clarity, usability and systems that scale, not just pretty screens.

03Iterate and refine

I test, validate and improve until the solution actually works in the real world.

About me

I'm a UX/UI Designer focused on complex digital products, mainly in B2B and enterprise environments.

I design clear, scalable systems and enjoy solving messy problems through structure, usability and logic.

I’ve worked on internal platforms, dashboards and product tools, collaborating closely with product and engineering teams.

With an art background, I care about visual balance, but I always design with real users and real constraints in mind.

Have a complex product?

Let’s work together

I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations.
